tool_description: BitcoinAverage is one of the leading providers of bitcoin price data, both ticker and historical.
name: BitcoinAverage crypto ticker and historical price
title: BitcoinAverage crypto ticker and historical price
tool_name: BitcoinAverage crypto ticker and historical price

api_list.name: Crypto Exchange Ticker price
api_list.description: Get the latest price data for specific cryptocurrency exchange.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bitcoinaverage-crypto-ticker-and-historical-price.p.rapidapi.com/exchanges/ticker/bitstamp"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bitcoinaverage-crypto-ticker-and-historical-price.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bitcoinaverage-crypto-ticker-and-historical-price.p.rapidapi.com/exchanges/ticker/{exchange}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bitcoinaverage-crypto-ticker-and-historical-price.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Historical price data for period
api_list.description:
Returns history price for specific symbol for certain period.
Works in parallel to the Ticker endpoint where both symbol set and market symbol need to be specified.
This endpoint additionally accepts the period query parameter that specifies the resolution of the data.
Period can be: minute, hour or day.

api_list.name: History data since timestamp
api_list.description:
Provides historical data since specific timestamp.
Accepts the regular symbol set and symbol parameter to specify the crypto market.
Also accepts query parameters to specify the timestamp for querying and the resolution of the data.
The resolution can be minute, hour or day.
Minute resolution goes back 24 hours.
Hour resolution can go back to 30 days.
Day resolution can go back years, for BTC it goes back to 2010.

api_list.name: Cryptocurrency Index Ticker price
api_list.description:
Get the latest Ticker price for thousands of cryptocurrencies.
Our Ticker data includes the latest price, bid, ask, 24h volume, moving average and price changes.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description:
The shorthand symbol of the market you are requesting data for.
A full list of supported symbols grouped by symbol set can be found [here.](https://apiv2.bitcoinaverage.com/info/indices/ticker)

required_parameters.name: symbol_set
required_parameters.description: Symbol set can be one of: global, local, crypto, tokens and light

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bitcoinaverage-crypto-ticker-and-historical-price.p.rapidapi.com/indices/global/ticker/BTCUSD"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bitcoinaverage-crypto-ticker-and-historical-price.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bitcoinaverage-crypto-ticker-and-historical-price.p.rapidapi.com/indices/{symbol_set}/ticker/{symbol}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bitcoinaverage-crypto-ticker-and-historical-price.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List of all supported crypto markets
api_list.description:
Lists all supported cryptocurrency markets by the BitcoinAverage API.
New cryptos or tokens are added on a monthly basis.

api_list.name: History price at a point in time
api_list.description: Fetch the exact price of a cryptocurrency at a specific timestamp in the past.
